title: STK Toronto located at 153 Yorkville Avenue
statement: STK Toronto is located at 153 Yorkville Avenue, Toronto, ON M5R 1C4 in the heart of the Yorkville neighbourhood just off Bloor Street.

citations.quote: STK Toronto is located at 153 Yorkville Avenue, Toronto, ON M5R 1C4 , in the heart of the Yorkville neighbourhood just off Bloor Street.
